title: Garen is too unbalanced
body: This has been annoying me for a very long time now, playing against a Garen is just straight up unfair. He is much too unbalanced to be in the game and should be nerfed ASAP. My reasons for this, he is very tanky yet dishes out more damage than most squishy champions. He is extremely easy to use and anyone can play him and still dominate the game, no problem. He has a silence, true damage and an AOE spell that makes it nearly impossible to take him down while he's alone or in a group. Garen needs to be nerfed immediately, anyone else agree?{{champion:86}} {{item:3083}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
